bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Helen Cassidy to Philip Showalter Hench, December 6, 1952

div1.p: Cassidy informs Hench that she would like to publish a piece about Walter Reed, the recent dedication ceremony in Cuba, and Hench's continued interest in the story. She inquires if he would be willing to lend manuscripts or reprints that might furnish background material.

div1.head: Letter from Helen Cassidy to Philip Showalter Hench, December 6, 1952
div1.p:
We would like very much to have in Mayovox
a Walter Reed story slanted toward your long
continued interest in the history of the research
on yellow fever in Cuba and the recent dedication
ceremony there.

Do you have any manuscripts or reprints
which might furnish background material that
you would be willing to lend us? Either Bill Holmes
or I would like very much to talk to you about it too.
